traits.name: Aetherwall
traits.text: Gains resistance against all abilities from characters that are outside of range 2 from them (Cover halves ranged damage).
traits.altText: Damage from beyond range 2 is halved.

traits.name: Armor X
traits.text: Reduce all damage taken by X.

traits.name: Arkentech Power Armor
traits.text: Start combat with Vigor 1.

traits.name: Attack
traits.text: Characters can only make one ability with the attack tag per turn.

traits.name: Aura of Rot
traits.text: The creature has aura 2. Foes that start or end their turn in the aura lose all vigor, then take 2 piercing damage.
traits.altText: Aura 2: clears enemy vigor and causes 2 piercing damage on turn start or end.

traits.name: Automata
traits.text: This character always attempts to attack and focus on the closest foe at the start of its turn.

traits.name: Blood drain
traits.text: Attacks ignore vigor against bloodied foes and gain +1 boon.

traits.name: Branded
traits.text: Attackers gain +1 boon against this character.

traits.name: Bullheaded
traits.text: Has resistance unless suffering from a status.

traits.name: Camouflage
traits.text: If this beast ends its turn adjacent to an object or inside difficult terrain, it gains stealth.

traits.name: Commander's Aura
traits.text: Aura 2. Allies in the aura gain +1 boon on attacks.

traits.name: Commanding Officer
traits.text: Designate one foe the commanding officer of the imperial detachment. They get a special template.

traits.name: Clinging Mists
traits.text: The Nocturnal has aura 2. If there are no other characters in the aura, it gains stealth at the end of its turn, and has evasion.

traits.name: Defiance
traits.text: Prevents hit points from being reduced past 1 hp. When this triggers, remove this effect and character becomes immune to all damage for the rest of the current turn.
traits.altText: Become invincible for the rest of the turn when first reduced past 1 hp.

traits.name: Divine Presence
traits.text: Immune to stun.

traits.name: Dodge
traits.text: Immune to all damage from missed area attacks, successful saves, and area effects.

traits.name: Elite
traits.text: This foe takes 2 turns. Double HP for the foe. Then increase the recharge of any of their abilities 4+ or lower to 5+.

traits.name: Enrage
traits.text: Gain +1 action when bloodied.

traits.name: Evasion
traits.text: Roll a d6 when targeted by an attack. On a 4+, the attack automatically misses. Check before the attack roll.

traits.name: Fortify
traits.text: Gain Vigilance 1 at the end of your turn.

traits.name: Flying
traits.text: A flying character ignores terrain damage and movement penalties, height movement penalties, obstruction, and engagement.

traits.name: Great Enrage
traits.text: Sturdy and +1 action while bloodied.

traits.name: Great Leap
traits.text: Ignores height movement penalties. When moving from a higher elevation to a lower one, may fly until movement ends.

traits.name: Guard
traits.text: Reduce all damage to self and allies in orthogonal spaces by 2, as if by armor.

traits.name: Heavy Armor
traits.text: Resistant to abilities used from adjacent spaces.

traits.name: Hunter in the Mist
traits.text: Attacks are a critical hit (+[D]) against characters with no allies or allied summons adjacent.

traits.name: Imperial: Flee
traits.text: When the commanding officer of an Imperial detachment has been defeated, there's a 1 in 6 change at the start of each round that the remaining imperials will surrender or flee, ending the fight.

traits.name: Imperial: Kin
traits.text: Imperials are kin, can be bargained with, and will flee or surrender if heavily outnumbered or heavily losing a fight.

traits.name: Imperial Command Aura
traits.text: Aura 2. Allies in the aura gain +1 boon on attacks and can randomly critically hit (+[D]).

traits.name: Legend
traits.text: Takes 1 turn after each player character turn.

traits.name: Legion of the Dead
traits.text: Relict are a legion of mindless husks, cursed with an undying existence. This gives all relict except Legends the following trait: This character has a chance to rise again when defeated. Roll 1d6 at the start of each round that this character is defeated. On a 4+, this character gets back up at 25% hp, returning it from defeated, and can take a turn normally this round. If defeated again, this character disintegrates and is removed from the battlefield. If all characters with this trait are defeated, it deactivates.
traits.altText: After dying, 33% chance to revive at 25% hp on their turn, once.

traits.name: Mob
traits.text: This character doesn't trigger slay effects.

traits.name: Nimble
traits.text: Has evasion unless suffering from a status.

traits.name: Overdrive
traits.text: At the start of round 4, this character becomes powered up. All their attacks are critical hits on hits (+[D]).

traits.name: Pacified
traits.text: Character deals half damage. Breaks on taking damage from an ability.

traits.name: Phasing
traits.text: Can ignore obstruction and pass through, but not end your turn in, terrain, objects, or characters.

traits.name: Primal Strength
traits.text: When a brawler beast causes a character to collide, that character is dazed.

traits.name: Rampart
traits.text: Foes cannot enter or exit a space affected by a rampart effect by dashing, flying or teleporting.
traits.altText: Dashing, flying and teleporting don't break engagement

traits.name: Receive Orders
traits.text: When an imperial that's not a commanding officer starts its turn in range of an imperial command aura, it recharges all of its abilities.

traits.name: Repeatable
traits.text: This action is repeatable any number of times in a turn, ignoring the no repeats rule.

traits.name: Relict: Monsters
traits.text: Relict do not flee or negotiate.

traits.name: Ruin beast: Monsters
traits.text: Beasts do not negotiate. They might flee if losing badly.

traits.name: Rush X
traits.text: Move X spaces. You are unstoppable and immune to all damage while moving.

traits.name: Sacrifice X
traits.text: Reduce your hp by X, usually as a cost for an ability. Sacrifice costs are paid at the start of an ability, cannot be reduced, ignored, transferred, or resisted, cannot bring your hp below 1, and you can pay them even if you don't have enough hp left.

traits.name: Sealed
traits.text: Character cannot inflict statuses.

traits.name: Shattered
traits.text: Cannot gain or benefit from vigor.

traits.name: Shelter
traits.text: Make all saves with +1 boon.

traits.name: Skirmisher
traits.text: A character with this trait can move diagonally and dash at full speed.

traits.name: Slashed
traits.text: Take 4 damage after you or an ally uses an ability that moves you, but no more than once a turn.

traits.name: Slimy skin
traits.text: When damaged, may dash 1 as an effect.

traits.name: Slip
traits.text: Movement ignores rampart, interrupts, and vigilance.

traits.name: Slippery
traits.text: Evasion while bloodied.

traits.name: Stealth
traits.text: Cannot be directly targeted except from an adjacent space. Breaks on using any ability other than dash.

traits.name: Stench
traits.text: This beast has aura 1. Characters in the aura have +1 curse on attacks and saves, and are poisoned if they end their turn there. Poisoned foes treat the area as dangerous terrain.

traits.name: Sturdy
traits.text: Immune to shove, daze, and stun.

traits.name: Vengeance
traits.text: When bloodied, next attack becomes a critical hit on hit (+[D]).

traits.name: Vigor X
traits.text: Gain a shield that goes over your hit points, equal to X times your vitality value. Damage goes to Vigor before Hit Points. Vigor does not stack, and when you gain Vigor you can choose to keep the old value or gain the new value. Lose all vigor at the end of combat.

traits.name: Vulnerable
traits.text: Applies +1 damage every time a character takes damage, for each separate instance of damage.

traits.name: True Strike
traits.text: Ignores dodge, blind, evasion, and stealth.

actions.name: Diaga
actions.text: An ally in range 4 is cured.
actions.altText: Range 4 cure.

actions.name: Redondo
actions.text: Swap places with an adjacent ally.

actions.name: Cleave
actions.text: On hit: 2[D] + fray. On miss: fray. Area effect: All foes adjacent to the attack target take fray damage.

actions.name: Strike
actions.text: An adjacent foe is dazed. Dazed foes take fray damage.

actions.name: Strafe shot
actions.text: On hit: [D] + fray. Miss: fray. Effect: May dash 1 before and after the attack. Ignores cover and deals bonus damage against bloodied foes.
actions.altText: Light attack +1 boon. Can crit. Effect: Dash 1 before and after. Ignore cover, bonus against bloodied.

actions.name: Glare
actions.text: A foe in range 5 takes fray damage, then must save or become blinded.
actions.altText: Range 5. Fray and save ?: blinded.

actions.name: Riddle
actions.text: On hit: Deal 3 damage five times. Miss: Two times. Effect: Ignores cover.
actions.altText: 5x 3 damage. 2x on miss. Ignores cover.

actions.name: Overpower
actions.text: On hit: [D] + fray. Miss: fray. Area effect: All foes adjacent to the attack target take 2 damage.
actions.altText: Light attack. Blast 1 on target with 2 damage.

actions.name: Strike
actions.text: An adjacent foe must save or become dazed. Dazed foes take fray damage.
actions.altText: Foe saves or is dazed and takes fray.

actions.name: Death March
actions.text: This character and all adjacent allies may move 1 space in the same direction, ignoring engagement, then each may deal 2 damage to an adjacent foe.
actions.altText: Me + adjacent allies move 1 space, then hit adjacent foe for 2.

actions.name: Withstand
actions.text: When self or an adjacent ally is targeted by an attack, may grant resistance against the attack.
actions.altText: When me or adjacent ally is targeted, halve damage.

actions.name: Bash
actions.text: An adjacent foe is shoved 1 and must save or become winded. Collide: Foe fails the save.
actions.altText: Shove adjacent foe 1, wind if fail save or collide.

actions.name: Unholy
actions.text: On hit: 2[D] + fray. Miss or area effect: fray. Effect: Sealed foes must sacrifice 4. Then, attack target is sealed.
actions.altText: Heavy attack with medium blast, range 5. Sealed -> Sacrifice 4, target -> sealed.

actions.name: Fear
actions.text: Mark a foe in range 6. While marked, that foe deals half damage unless adjacent to an ally. If they end their turn adjacent to an ally, they can save to clear this mark.
actions.altText: Fear foe in range 6 to deal half damage unless next to an ally. Can save end of turn if next to ally.

actions.name: Black Communion
actions.text: Area effect: Foes take 2 damage. Allies gain 2 vigor. Then, create a difficult terrain effect space of grasping dead hands underneath every foe in the area. While inside a grasping hands space, foes are sealed+ and cannot gain vigor.
actions.altText: Range 5 line 4 deals 2 damage and grants allies 2 vigor. Difficult terrain under every foe in area, applying sealed+ to foes and preventing vigor.

actions.name: Necrotize
actions.text: Area effect: foes take 2 piercing damage. Self and allies gain vigor 2. Effect: The Embalmer gains Aura 2 until the start of its next turn. Foes that end their turn in the aura must sacrifice 2 and have a grasping hands space created under them, as per Black Communion. While inside a grasping hands space, foes are sealed+ and cannot gain vigor.
actions.altText: Foes: pierce 2, allies: vigor 2. Gain Aura 2 of grasping dead until next turn, foes ending turn in aura sacrifice 2 and create grasping hands space.

actions.name: Chain Lightning
actions.text: On hit: [D] + 2, twice. Miss or area effect: 2 damage, twice.

actions.name: Soul Spark
actions.text: Creates a Soul Spark summon in free space in range. Round 3+: Two sparks.

actions.name: Unstable Charge
actions.text: Mark a foe in range. At the end of that foe's turn, they take 1 piercing damage, once, for every other character in range 2, then become vulnerable. Then, this mark ends.

actions.name: Summon Effect
actions.text: Foes adjacent to Soul Sparks are vulnerable+, and all damage dealt to them becomes piercing.

actions.name: Area effect
actions.text: If a foe ends their turn adjacent to a spark, it releases a small blast pulse centered on it, dealing 1 piercing damage twice to all foes.

actions.name: Effect
actions.text: The wraith can target the spark with Chain Lightning. If they do, it gains rebound and the spark triggers its area effect.

actions.name: Synaptic Storm
actions.text: Creates a massive network storm in range, which could overlap characters. The storm is a small blast terrain effect that is dangerous terrain, which relict ignore. Foes in the storm are vulnerable+. Using this ability again with an active storm can move the storm 2 spaces instead of replacing it. If used this way it costs 1 action. At round 3+, moving a storm is a free action.
actions.altText: Create or move small blast dangerous terrain effect. Moving costs 1 action at round 1/2, and is free on round 3+.

actions.name: Lightning Bolter
actions.text: On hit: [D] + fray and electrify. Miss: fray. Effect: Ignores adjacency penalties for ranged attacks. Foes in range 2 of the target take fray damage.
actions.altText: Light attack. Effect: range 2 splash to foes], ignore adjacency penalties.

actions.name: Discharge Bolt
actions.text: The Automota shoots a line 8 area effect. Characters in the area are electrified. Electrified characters take [D].
actions.altText: Line 8 -> Electrified -> [D].

actions.name: Full auto
actions.text: While in this stance, the this character's is immobile, but all their attacks deal bonus damage, pierce, ignore cover, and gain +1 boon. They lose this stance if they are shoved or moved for any reason.
actions.altText: Can't move, deal bonus damage, pierce, ignore cover, +1 boon. Exits when moved/shoved.

actions.name: Speed Clip
actions.text: The Automata enters Full Auto.
actions.altText: Go Full Auto.

actions.name: Disappearing Act
actions.text: Trigger: When bloodied. Effect: may teleport 4, then gain stealth.

actions.name: Wicked Slice
actions.text: On hit: [D] + fray. Miss: fray. Effect: Critical hit (+[D]) against bloodied characters. Effect: Dash 1 before and after the attack.
actions.altText: Light attack +1 boon. Can crit. Effect: Dash 1 before and after.

actions.name: Vile
actions.text: A foe in range 5 is slowed, and must save or take take 1 piercing damage for each space they move until the end of their next turn.
actions.altText: Slow foe in range 5, save or take 1 piercing for each square they move next turn.

actions.name: Foul Play
actions.text: Teleport 3, then deal [D] to an adjacent foe. Can repeat this effect, but must choose a different foe each time unless no other foes are in range, or this effect has triggered four times.
actions.altText: Teleport 3, then deal [D] to an adjacent foe. Can chain up to four times.

actions.name: Aim
actions.text: Next ranged attack increases all damage by +[D], gains +1 boon, ignores cover, and doubles its range.
actions.altText: +[D], +1 boon, ignore cover, double range on next attack.

actions.name: Heart Seeker
actions.text: On hit: 2[D] + fray. Miss: fray. Effect: Cannot target characters in range 2.
actions.altText: Heavy. Must be outside range 2.

actions.name: Hilt sweep
actions.text: Autohit: fray damage and shove 1. Effect: All other adjacent foes are shoved 1.
actions.altText: Autohit shove and fray. Shove neighbors too.

actions.name: Shoulder check
actions.text: Dash 1 and gain vigilance 1. Smite recharges.

actions.name: Smite
actions.text: Attack: On hit: 3[D] + fray and foe is stunned and shoved 1. Miss: fray damage and foe is dazed. Effect: +1 boon against dazed characters.
actions.altText: 3[D] heavy attack, stunning and shoving. Boon against dazed foes.

actions.name: Stab
actions.text: On hit: [D] + fray, Miss: fray. Attack is a critical hit (+[D]) if made against a blinded or slow character.
actions.altText: Light attack, crits on blinded / slow target.

actions.name: Throw Knife
actions.text: A foe in range 3 takes fray damage.

actions.name: Pocket Dust
actions.text: An adjacent foe must save or become blinded or slow (Skulk chooses). The Skulk then gains stealth.
actions.altText: Blind or slow foe, gain stealth.

actions.name: Holy
actions.text: Autohit: [D] + fray. Miss or area effect: fray. Effect: Foes inside are branded. Branded foes must save or become pacified.
actions.altText: Light attack blast 1. AoE -> Branded -> Save ?: Pacified.

actions.name: Redempta
actions.text: Target defeated ally in range 4 and remove incapacitated. They stop being defeated and return with 50% hp. They can act normally and take a turn starting next round.
actions.altText: Resurrect defeated ally in range 4 at 50% hp.

actions.name: Shield of Faith
actions.text: Allied character in range 3 becomes marked, and gains sturdy and resistance while marked and in range 3 of the priest.
actions.altText: Mark sturdy and resistant bodyguard.

actions.name: Get Down Sir!
actions.text: Trigger: An adjacent ally takes damage from an ability. Effect: The Auxiliary is defeated. The ally gains resistance to that ability.
actions.altText: Sacrifice self to grant resistance to adjacent ally.

actions.name: Arquebus
actions.text: Autohit: Deal 1 piercing damage. Increase to 2 piercing damage if in the command aura of an imperial officer or if the target is burning.
actions.altText: Autohit: 1 pierce, 2 if near officer or burning target.

actions.name: Counter-strike
actions.text: Trigger: The Trooper or an adjacent ally is hit or miss by a melee attack. Effect: The attacker is shoved 1 and must save. On a failed save, they take fray damage and are dazed.
actions.altText: Nearby ally hit, attacker shoved, takes fray and dazed.

actions.name: Brutal Slash
actions.text: On hit: [D] + fray. Miss: fray. Critical hit: Foe is stunned.

actions.name: Blunderbuss
actions.text: The trooper fires a heavy sidearm in a Line 3 area effect. Foes inside are shoved 1 and take 2 damage.
actions.altText: Line 3, 2 damage and shove.

actions.name: Hold the Line!
actions.text: The Trooper gains aura 2 until the end of its next turn. The Trooper and any of its allies inside the aura have resistance against melee attacks.
actions.altText: Aura 2 of melee resistance.

actions.name: Chain Slash
actions.text: On hit: [D] + fray. Miss or area effect: fray. Critical Hit: Repeat the area effect.
actions.altText: Light attack. AoE twice on crit.

actions.name: Slash
actions.text: On hit: [D] + fray. Miss: fray. Effect: Foe is slashed.
actions.altText: Light attack. Target slashed on hit.

actions.name: Bash
actions.text: An adjacent foe is shoved 2.
actions.altText: Shove 2.

actions.name: Valiant
actions.text: The soldier rushes up to 4 spaces in a straight line, then may use Bash as a free action.
actions.altText: Rush 4 line + free Bash.

actions.name: Heavy Arquebus
actions.text: On hit: 2[D] + fray and foe is vulnerable. Miss: [D] + fray. Critical hit: Damage becomes divine. Recharge: Only recharges by taking the reload action.
actions.altText: Heavy attack, making target vulnerable. Divine on crit.

actions.name: Reload rifle
actions.text: Heavy Arquebus recharges. Effect: Becomes a free action in a Command Aura.
actions.altText: Recharge Heavy Arquebus.

actions.name: Grappling hook
actions.text: The Gunner teleports adjacent to a summon or object in range 3. Alternately, it can teleport adjacent to a foe in range, and that foe becomes shattered.
actions.altText: Teleport to foe or summon, shattering foe.

actions.name: Suppressor turret
actions.text: The Gunner summons a gun emplacement in range 4. Gun turret: Size 1, immobile summon. Summon effect: When a foe in range 4 from the emplacement is damaged by an attack or ability, the emplacement deals 1 piercing damage to that foe, ignoring cover. This effect can trigger any number of times a round.
actions.altText: Summon zappy turret.

actions.name: Flame Grenade
actions.text: A foe in range is shattered and burning. Burning foes take [D].
actions.altText: Foe -> burning (+ shattered) -> [D].

actions.name: Thumper Grenade
actions.text: Area effect: fray damage. Create a pit in the center space.
actions.altText: Fray and make pit.

actions.name: Leader's strike
actions.text: On hit: [D] + fray. Miss: fray. Effect: Up to two allies in range 3 can dash 2 spaces.
actions.altText: Light attack. Allies can dash.

actions.name: Coordinate Strikes
actions.text: A foe in range is marked. While marked, they can't benefit from stealth, and attacks against them gain true strike.
actions.altText: Mark to prevent stealth and cause true strike while in Aura 2.

actions.name: Marching Orders
actions.text: When Commander takes this stance, as an action while in this stance, and at start of each of the commander's turns, the commander and all allies in range 2 can dash 2 in the same direction.
actions.altText: Aura 2. Allies can dash 2 at the start of my turn in a shared direction.

actions.name: Smash
actions.text: On hit: [D] + fray. Miss: fray. Effect: Shove 1. If either foe or this character is bloodied, increase shove to 3.
actions.altText: Light attack. Shove 1, 3 if anyone bloodied.

actions.name: Rampage
actions.text: Effect: The beast dashes up to 2 spaces. When it ends this movement, adjacent foes take 2 damage and is shoved 1.
actions.altText: Dash 2, 2 damage and shove 1 to adjacent foes.

actions.name: Charge
actions.text: Effect: The beast chooses a foe in range 2. At the end of that foe's next turn, the beast dashes up to 5 spaces towards that foe, phasing through characters. Characters the beast passes through are shoved 1 to either side and take fray damage. If the beasts ends this movement adjacent to their foe, that foe must save or take 2[D] + fray and become stunned, or [D] + fray only on a successful save. Effect: This ability has no recharge if the beast is bloodied.
actions.altText: Charge marked foe in range 5 at the end of their next turn. {Heavy damage + stun} / light damage. No recharge if bloodied.

actions.name: Tongue Lash
actions.text: A foe in range 4 takes fray damage, then must save or become poisoned and shoved as far as possible towards the Halitoad. Poisoned characters fail the save. Effect: Range 8 while bloodied.
actions.altText: Range 4 (8 while bloodied), fray damage. {Poisoned, shoved towards Halitoad}.

actions.name: Howl
actions.text: All non-howler characters in a close blast 1 area effect must save or take [D] + fray and be stunned. Effect: Can be used as an Interrupt when bloodied.
actions.altText: Close blast 1. {[D] + fray, stun}. Can be an interrupt when bloodied.

actions.name: Iron Grip
actions.text: The Howler dashes 3 spaces in any direction. An adjacent foe when it starts moving must save or be dragged them with it, shoving its target towards it until its adjacent. Bloodied foes fail the save.
actions.altText: Dash 3. Adjacent foe {dragged}.

actions.name: Body Slam
actions.text: The Howler flies into the air and comes slamming back down. Adjacent characters must choose: be shoved 1, or take fray damage.
actions.altText: Adjacent foes shove 1 / fray.

actions.name: Biotic
actions.text: On hit: 2[D] + fray. Miss or area effect: fray. Effect: On hit, foe is shattered and poisoned. Shatters foe even on miss if they are poisoned.
actions.altText: Heavy. Shatter and poison foe if hit or poisoned.

actions.name: Deluge
actions.text: The beast dashes 2, then deals 2 piercing damage to a foe in range 6.
actions.altText: Dash 2, pierce 2 in range 6.

actions.name: Blight Lob
actions.text: The Beast creates a blast 1 area of difficult terrain in range 8. Characters standing in the area are vulnerable+. The area lasts for the rest of combat, or until this beast uses this ability again.
actions.altText: Range 8, blast 1. Difficult terrain inflicting vulnerable.

actions.name: Latch on
actions.text: The Husk moves up to 3 spaces in a straight line, then an adjacent character becomes immobile until the Husk is no longer adjacent or is defeated.
actions.altText: Dash up to 3 in a line then grapple a target.

actions.name: Lurching grab
actions.text: Dash 1, then autohit: 1 damage. If the target started this turn immobile, then deal 3 piercing damage.
actions.altText: Dash 1 then do 1 damage, or 3 to grappled targets.

actions.name: Slime Spit
actions.text: The Gulper creates a line 6 area of difficult terrain. Foes caught in the area when it is created are shoved 2. Collide: Foe is shattered.
actions.altText: Line 6 difficult terrain. Shove 2 on hit, shatter on collide.

actions.name: Razor Wind
actions.text: Repeat the following effect three times: Dash 1, then deal 2 damage to all adjacent foes. Must move in the same direction.
actions.altText: 3x Dash 1 (in a line) and 2 damage to adjacent foes.

actions.name: Gust
actions.text: The Dervish or an ally in range 2 may fly 2.

actions.name: Thousand cuts
actions.text: Repeat the following effect four times: Effect: Teleport 1, then deal 2 damage to all adjacent foes. Must teleport to a different space each time.
actions.altText: 4x Teleport 1 and 2 damage to adjacent foes.

actions.name: Blackheart
actions.text: On hit: Deal [D] + fray. Miss: fray. Effect: Deals 2 damage to all foes adjacent to the archon or their target Effect: Gains +1 boon and deals bonus damage for each of the following: character is stunned, dazed, or winded.
actions.altText: Light attack. 2 damage splash around self and target. +1 boon per stunned, dazed, winded.

actions.name: Iron Fist
actions.text: Effect: An adjacent foe must save or become dazed, if they are already dazed, they are also winded.
actions.altText: Adjacent. {Foe -> Dazed -> Winded}.

actions.name: Great Slam
actions.text: Dash 2 spaces, then all adjacent foes are shoved 1 space. Collide: foe is stunned.
actions.altText: Dash 2 and shove adjacent foes.

actions.name: Great Shieldwall
actions.text: While in this stance, becomes immobile, but self and adjacent allies gain resistance. Ends at the start of the Archon's next turn.
actions.altText: Immobile. Aura 1 resistance. Lasts until next turn.

actions.name: Withstand
actions.text: When self or an adjacent ally is targeted by an attack, may grant resistance against the attack.
actions.altText: Grant Resistance to nearby attacked foe.

actions.name: Bash
actions.text: An adjacent foe is shoved 1 and must save or become winded. Collide: Foe fails the save.
actions.altText: Adjacent foe is shoved 1, {Winded | Collide}.

foes.name: Nocturnal

actions.name: Juggernaut
actions.text: Clear a status, mark, or all blights affecting this character.

actions.name: The Horror
actions.text: On hit: [D] + fray and shove 1. Miss: fray damage. Effect: May teleport up to 3 spaces before or after the attack.
actions.altText: Light + shove 1. Teleport 3 before or after.

actions.name: Rake
actions.text: Foes in the area take fray damage. The Nocturnal may teleport to any space in the area after this action resolves.
actions.altText: Line 4 fray. Teleport into the line.

actions.name: Disappear
actions.text: Remove the Nocturnal from the battlefield and place them in any free space.
actions.altText: Free Teleport X.

foes.phaseDescription: Phase change triggers at the start of each round. The Nocturnal starts in phase II and can shift up or down one phase (so it can't shift from I to III for example). It must shift phases.

phases.name: Phase I - Hard to hit, disrupt foes

actions.name: Paranoia
actions.text: A foe in range 6 is marked. While marked, they cannot target allies with abilities and effects. A character can save at the end of their turn to clear this mark, ending it on a success.
actions.altText: Foe in range 6 marked to not trust allies.

actions.name: Amygdala
actions.text: All foes in range 3 are forced to flee. They must save or be shoved 2 spaces in a direction of the Nocturnal's choice. At the start of their next turn, even if they saved successfully, the Nocturnal can shove them 2 in a direction of its choice.
actions.altText: Range 3 effect. {Shoved 2 spaces by Nocturnal}. Targets shoved 2 on their turn.

actions.name: Great Fell Shot
actions.text: Mark two unoccupied spaces in range 8. Area effect: Characters that enter that space or start their turn there are struck by a projectile, taking 3 damage twice, and ending this effect. This area lasts until triggered.
actions.altText: Prep 2 spaces in range 8 to deal 3 damage twice.

actions.name: Embrace
actions.text: An adjacent foe must save. On a successful save, they are shoved 1 and take [D] + fray. On a failed save, they take divine damage equal to 50% of their max hp. Either way, this attack can't take them below 1 hp.
actions.altText: {50% hp divine damage}, otherwise light damage and shove 1. Non-lethal.

actions.name: Open Wound
actions.text: A foe in range 4 is marked. While marked, when that foe is shoved, they take fray damage. A foe can save against this effect at the end of their turn, ending the mark.
actions.altText: Foe in range 4 marked to take fray when shoved.

actions.name: Ambush
actions.text: On hit: [D] + fray. Miss: fray. Effect: Against a bloodied foe, becomes a critical hit, and blinds on hit.
actions.altText: Light melee, crits and blinds bloodied.

actions.name: Prowl
actions.text: Dash 1 and gain stealth.

actions.name: Rake
actions.text: Foes in the area take fray damage. The Stalking Beast may teleport to any space in the area after this action resolves.
actions.altText: Line 3 fray, teleport into line.

actions.name: Pounce
actions.text: The cat gains stealth. Choose a foe in range 3. If, at the end of that foe's next turn, they are still in range 3 of the cat, it may teleport adjacent to them and deal [D], ending this effect.

actions.name: Bloody crescent
actions.text: On hit: [D] + fray. Miss or area effect: fray.
actions.altText: Light attack.

actions.name: Swipe
actions.text: All foes adjacent to the berserker take 2 damage.
actions.altText: 2 damage self blast 1.

actions.name: Leap
actions.text: The berserker flies 2. When it lands, all adjacent characters are shoved 1.
actions.altText: Fly 2 then adjacent foes shoved 1.

actions.name: Rabble
actions.text: Autohit: 1 damage. If an ally is adjacent to the target, deal 3 damage instead.

actions.name: Rush
actions.text: Dash 2, then deal 1 damage to an adjacent foe, then shove an adjacent foe 1 space. A foe can only be shoved this way once on the same turn.

actions.name: Malicious Latch
actions.text: Can latch on to an adjacent foe as an action or by using its standard move. A foe can pass a save to avoid this effect, and can repeat the save at the end of their turns, ending it on a success and shoving the ape into a free adjacent space. While latched on to a foe, the foe is pacified+ and the ape can choose whether any of the apes abilities apply to it or not.
actions.altText: {Stick to and make foe pacified}.

actions.name: Scrabble
actions.text: Autohit: Fray damage.

actions.name: Pheromones
actions.text: A foe in range 4 is pacified.

actions.name: Spur
actions.text: The character the symbiote is latched on to dashes 3 and may deal fray damage to an adjacent character of the symbiotes choice.
actions.altText: Latched foe dashes 3 and deal fray damage to an adjacent foe.

actions.name: Aura of the Endless Legion
actions.text: Aura 2. When any Relict in the region is defeated in the aura, summon a Husk in a free space in the aura.

actions.name: Call of the Lost
actions.text: Summon 3 husks adjacent to a foe in range 8.

actions.name: Hamstring
actions.text: On hit: [D] + fray. Miss: fray. Effect: On hit, until the end of their next turn, foe takes 2 damage for each space they move.
actions.altText: Light attack. Makes target take 2 damage per moved space.

actions.name: Life Drain
actions.text: Effect: A foe in range 3 takes fray damage, ignoring vigor. If they are bloodied, they take fray damage twice instead, ignoring vigor.
actions.altText: 3 divine damage. Doubled if bloodied.

actions.name: Terrorize
actions.text: Effect: A foe in range 4 must save or become blinded+ and gains +1 curse on all attacks and saves until it ends a turn adjacent to an ally. On a successful save, they are only blinded. Blinded or Bloodied foes fail the save.
actions.altText: Range 4 {blinded+, +1 curse on attacks and save until next to an ally | Blinded or Bloodied}.
